name: Trey's Trip
description:
Trey's Trip

Developed at INDIEJAM Summer Gamejam 2015 in Aalborg.

#gamesnbqq #indiejamdk

Known Bugs:

- If you run the game in another resolution than you run Windows with. Then the position of the trigger of the Start button, will be placed a little above and to the left of the Start button text.
(* Look for when the Start text is highlighted and click)
